Title: Bright Star
Writer: Jane Campion, Jane Campion (screenplay), Andrew Motion (biography "Keats")
Actors: Abbie Cornish, Ben Whishaw, Paul Schneider, Kerry Fox
Plot: The three-year romance between 19th-century poet John Keats and Fanny Brawne near the end of his life.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 16 wins & 53 nominations.
Production: Australian Film Finance Corporation, BBC Films, Hopscotch Productions, Screen Australia, Jan Chapman Pictures, Path√© Renn Productions, UK Film Council, New South Wales Film & Television Office
